meanings.definition: Diligent, thorough, and extremely attentive to details
meanings.sent1: She was very scrupulous in checking her work for any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The scrupulous detective carefully examined every clue at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The scrupulous squirrel double-checked every acorn it buried in the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her scrupulous approach to painting ensured every stroke was perfect.
meanings.sent5: The scrupulous gardener meticulously pruned each flower in the garden.

meanings.definition: Having moral integrity and strict principles
meanings.sent1: He is known for his scrupulous honesty in all his dealings.
meanings.sent2: The scrupulous judge always upheld the law with fairness and integrity.
meanings.sent3: The scrupulous student refused to cheat on the exam, even when tempted.
meanings.sent4: Her scrupulous dedication to truth made her a trusted journalist.
meanings.sent5: The scrupulous leader never compromised on ethical values for personal gain.

meanings.sent1: The artist took a scrupulous approach to selecting the perfect colors for the painting.
meanings.sent2: A scrupulous decision-making process is essential in critical situations.
meanings.sent3: The scrupulous planner meticulously organized every detail of the event.
meanings.sent4: His scrupulous analysis of the data revealed important patterns.
meanings.sent5: The scrupulous architect designed the building with precision and care.
